attributes.action: Raise the amount of carers allowance in line with inflation....
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The carers allowance is know where near enough to live, it is pittence, espcially if you do not have any other income coming in its a real struggle out there and the elderly/carers deserve better, its hard work caring for somebody who has lots of health problems and is in their 70's.

rejection.details: There is already a similar petition, see, http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ADORED/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
